name: Nhan Bui
about: An empathetic and committed team player with abilities to negotiate and problem solve quickly, accurately, and efficiently.

experiences.description:
- Create solid working relationships with clients to understand their business resourcing and growth requirements from a cultural and functional perspective.
- Fulfill liquidity per job posting. Manage and close revenue opportunities.
- Make sure the Customer Satisfaction is high enough to guarantee clients retention.
- With the help of the CSM identify potential up-selling opportunities for existing clients.
- Guiding, training and coaching clients to use the platform.
- Be familiar to some Application Tracking System (ATS)
